content.text:
According to the chart, what is the geographic origin of all races and ethnic groups in the world today? <image 1>

A. Africa
B. Australia
C. Bushmen
D. Europe and West Asia

The chart illustrates the "Ethnic Development Tree," which shows the branching of different ethnic groups from a common origin. The tree starts with "AFRICA" as the root, indicating that all the branches (representing various ethnic groups) originate from this point. Therefore, according to the chart, the geographic origin of all races and ethnic groups in the world today is:

A. Africa
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
